page.title: 12THORNHILL FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: Thornhill football team has eleven players and two substitutes. The usual nights for a match are Wednesday and Saturday. Every night at the end of a match the other team picks the Man of the Match in the opposing team. This means the opposing team picks who they think played the best, and award him "Man of the Match". This is to encourage the players to do better. The team coach is "Tich" Ainsley and he takes care of the park and the raffle tickets. The football park in which they play on home games is at the corner of the Loan and stretches round to the swing park. The teams Thornhill usually play are Kippen, Gargunnock, Buchlyvie, Gartmore, Gartocharn and Aberfoyle. The team's colours are light blue or a red top with navy shorts.
